channel.title: Barney dreams about chee.. eh.. a cat
channel.description:
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WSr0Cn6bL2g]What cat?[/url]
He talks about it one other time. Just after the start of the ''Follow Freeman'' chapter.
You take down the snipers that have Barney pinned down on the roof. You both go down and while he is opening a gate for you he says something;
''Did you hear a cat just now?'' ''That damn thing haunts me''
Seriously... What cat!? Discuss.. :jizz:

item.title: Barney dreams about chee.. eh.. a cat
item.dc:creator: Shadi
item.description:
CatzEyes93:

They are talking about a new teleporter.
Barney is concerned if it is working
Barney states having nightmares about a cat regarding a teleporter that didnt work.

I think it is safe to understand that a cat was killed while testing a teleporter in the past.

I thought this was common knowledge?

that’s pretty much it

Read full topic

item.title: Barney dreams about chee.. eh.. a cat
item.dc:creator: MarshmallowRadiation
item.description:
So out there there’s a cat/fly?

And when Lamarr jumped into the teleporter Gordon became a headcrab/person?

And when the crow came back with him he turned into a headcrab/crow/person?

Nvm. They fixed the teleporter. Though it would be freaky to see a cat with bug eyes :aah:

Or Gordon with a crow’s head and headcrab teeth on his stomach. :sick:

Read full topic

What the hell happened here?

item.title: Barney dreams about chee.. eh.. a cat
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
Isaac Kleiner: Right you are. This is a red letter day, we’ll inaugurate the new teleport with a double transmission.
Barney Calhoun: You mean it’s working? For real this time? Because… I still have nightmares about that cat.
Alyx Vance: What cat?
Isaac Kleiner: Now, now, there is nothing to be worried about, we have made major strides since then, major strides.
Alyx Vance: [more anxiously] What cat?

They are talking about a new teleporter.
Barney is concerned if it is working
Barney states having nightmares about a cat regarding a teleporter that didnt work.

I think it is safe to understand that a cat was killed while testing a teleporter in the past.

I thought this was common knowledge?

Read full topic
item.source: Barney dreams about chee.. eh.. a cat

item.title: Barney dreams about chee.. eh.. a cat
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
Well as far as I’m aware, in some of the first portalling experiments, a cat was used, and one part of it remained, whilst another came out on the other side. So Barney’s haunted by that.

At least, that’s what I think.

Read full topic
